title: getting leaverbuster punishments when my game crashes
body:
(reposting into different section bcuz riot told me to)
My computer normally works pretty well but for some reason the last few times ive queued up the client suddenly crashed and now im on 15 min wait punishment. Is there any way riot could set up something so that people who crash dont get punished for it?
I would like to state that this has only happened in champ select so i never turned any game into a 4v5. Also my computer and internet are both good, this only started happening recently, internet runs smoothly before crashes and and after starting the client back up after crashes.

replies.body:
I'd like to gather some more information to try and find out what's happening.  Are you receiving any errors like bug splat?  Is this happening while the game is trying to load, during champion select itself, or in-game?  Any additional information on this can help me find a solution for you.  

Regarding the leaverbuster, all leaves are treated equally because it still causes players a negative experience.  The only way to remove it is by playing consistently without any interruptions to return to good standing.  I hope that helps and I look forward to working this out with you!

It isnt a bugsplat error, it happens during champ select when i either pick or ban a champion. the client suddenly freezes and says its not responding. Recently it crashed while i was opening a chest as well. Also this has all happened within the last week or so and as far as i can tell both my computer and internet are working completely fine. The client works fine before and after crashes. Also, for leaverbuster, does it still count as negative even if its not during the game and im not turning it into a 4v5?

The lower priority queue you may be experiencing is a result of [queue dodging](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging), which is similar but occurs in champion select.  The symptoms you provided here strongly suggests that you could be having an issue staying connected to our servers, even if you are able to use your internet elsewhere.  Please go over each step in our [ Troubleshooting Connection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide, using custom games to test in order to prevent further queue times.  Please let me know the outcome once completed, and if it's resolved your specific issue.

nothing on the troubleshooting page seems to answer my problem, however ive just noticed that these crashes started happening when i started using Discord to talk with my friends while playing. Could there be a correlation? Discord doesn't lag my games though.
